definition: suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: And by the well, some wild mallows.
sentences.chinese: 而在井邊長着些野錦葵。

sentences.english: The relation between displacement relief coefficient and the side length of bracket joints that are added is nearly linear.
sentences.chinese: 位移減小系數幾乎與所加的角板邊長呈線性關係。

sentences.english: A good many more buds grew on the righthand side of the split surface than on the left.
sentences.chinese: 被劈開的表面上從右邊長出的幼芽比左邊多得多。

sentences.english: To calculate the area of a square double the length of one side.
sentences.chinese: 要計算正方形的面積，只需用邊長自乘即可。

sentences.english: And to give you a size perspective, that is about the size of my pinky finger nail, 4 mm on the side.
sentences.chinese: 這個芯片，有我的手指甲那麼大，邊長4毫米。

sentences.english: The new choker necklaces and drop single earring is best worn when you dress down.
sentences.chinese: 項圈和單邊長耳環是休閒打扮的最佳伴侶。

sentences.english: Near an apple tree grew a rose bush.
sentences.chinese: 在蘋果樹的旁邊長着一叢的玫瑰花。

sentences.english: The influence of side length value of regular hexagon on compression characteristics of honeycomb paperboard core was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了蜂窩紙芯正六邊形邊長值對壓縮性能的影響。

definition: external diameter (including thickness of the wall)
variant of 漁網|渔网[yu2 wang3]
lit. to use the eastern wind (idiom)/fig. to use sb's help
area above the lintel of a doorway
the cap of a pen, pencil or writing brush/the sheath of a pen (made of cloth, silk or thread)
